main.name: Damilola Faseun
main.description: A full-stack web developer based in Lagos Nigeria.
main.bio: I am a creative front-end developer. I use JavaScript and React to create highly interactive and user friendly web experience.  After obtaining my degree in Electrical engineer, I took up a trainee position as an electrical engineer and worked briefly in the media industry, a friend of mine introduced me programming and recommended the online learning platform 'freecodecamp.com'. I found in programming a passion that encourages me to be innovative and allows me to express my creativity.  I have a keen intrest in web development and always try to think out of the box. I like learning new things and keeping up with industry trends and advancements.
main.contactmessage: I am currently available for work. Get in touch.

address.street: 5 Alh. Adijat Lawal Cl, Mafoluku Oshodi

resume.skillmessage1: I excel in building clean and interactive user interfaces that work seamlessly across all devices with frameworks such as React and Vue. I also bring extensive experience in developing full-stack applications.
resume.skillmessage2: Additionally, I have hands-on expertise in deploying and managing applications using Google Cloud Platform, ensuring robust and scalable solutions.

education.school: Obafemi Awolowo University, Ile-ife, Osun State

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: I contributed as a Full Stack Developer, leveraging a diverse set of technologies to deliver high-quality web applications. On the frontend, I used Vue and React to create dynamic and responsive user interfaces, ensuring an engaging and seamless user experience. My work on the backend involved building robust and scalable server-side applications using Node.js and AdonisJS, enabling efficient data handling and secure communication between client and server. In addition, I played a key role in deploying and managing applications using Google Cloud Platform, optimizing the deployment pipeline and ensuring reliable performance and availability of our services.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: As a Full Stack Developer, I design, build, and test high-quality software solutions that are secure, scalable, and user-friendly. I ensure all deliverables meet industry standards and align with long-term technology goals. My approach is user-focused, emphasizing performance and seamless user experiences, while continuously exploring new technologies to drive digital transformation.

work.title: Frontend Developer
work.description: I primarily focused on frontend development, utilizing React to build user-friendly and interactive web interfaces. I worked on creating responsive designs and ensuring a seamless user experience across different devices. Although my primary focus was on frontend, I also contributed to backend development using Node.js and Express, enabling efficient server-side functionality and integrating it smoothly with the frontend.

projects.title: BlogKeep

projects.title: Web Stickies
projects.categories: A Simple  JavaScript application that allows you to quickly stick important note to your web browsers as a form of a remainder.

projects.title: PhoneBook
projects.categories: A web application that utilizes the MERN stack and allows users easily manage their phonebook

projects.title: Battleship
projects.categories: A JavaScript game allow a user play against battleships generated on grid locations and provides users with a trigger for targeting battleships locations on the grid

projects.title: Country-Finder
projects.categories: A React front-end portal that helps users acces information about a particular country including country flag, population, weather conditions etc .

projects.title: Project-Minimek
projects.categories: This is a miniature version of the MekHQ Battletech campaign force manager tool.
